body_html:
@pavithrasv I've commented your gist directly.
I understand that consuming dense_1 is not so easy and everybody want a simpler method to consume these kind of things with model_to_estimator but this is what we have now with this kind of high level api.

I want to try to support you but the bug was opened on Jan so It could be a little bit hard to me to invest time to extract snippets as I had in Jan/Feb/March cause I am on another activity now.

I hope that we can solve this interacting on your gist especially if the code will be ready to copy'n'paste in a colab notebook.

body:
@pavithrasv I've commented your gist directly.
I understand that consuming dense_1 is not so easy and everybody want a simpler method to consume these kind of things with `model_to_estimator` but this is what we have now with this kind of high level api.

I want to try to support you but the bug was opened on Jan so It could be a little bit hard to me to invest time to extract snippets as I had in Jan/Feb/March cause I am on another activity now.

I hope that we can solve this interacting on your gist especially if the code will be ready to copy'n'paste in a colab notebook.
